Source.Name: onedrive
Source.Summary: A complete tool to interact with OneDrive on Linux.
Source.Description: CLI tool to access and update your OneDrive files. Featuring shared folders, support for OneDrive for Business, resumable uploads, real-time file monitoring and state caching.
